attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Change the category of cannaibis back to a Class B for possession with intent to supply and use of the drug in accordance with the previous quantities related to cannabis. Professionals within medicine and the criminal justice system see daily lifes damaged by cannabis use including the development of psychosis.
Cannabis and other drug misuse increases acquisitive crime levels due to the users need for money to fund their use.  It also like alcohol has a detrimental effect on driving ability and the use of machinery.

rejection.details: The petition title must be a call for action and not your name
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
